unnormalised: IIT Delhiâ€™s cutoff for CSE touched a new high this yr, sources say. General category students needed a rank of under 100 to bag a seat. Crazy, right?
normalised: I-I-T Delhi's cutoff for C-S-E touched a new high this year, sources say. General category students needed a rank of under one hundred to bag a seat. Crazy, right?

unnormalised: But that's not all the news. Apparently, admissions to AIIMS Delhi for MBBS also saw intense competition. NEET scores had to be sky-high, with many students prepping for 2+ yrs! Cutoffs reportedly increased by about 5%.
normalised: But that's not all the news. Apparently, admissions to A-I-I-M-S Delhi for M-B-B-S also saw intense competition. N-E-E-T scores had to be sky-high, with many students prepping for two plus years! Cutoffs reportedly increased by about five percent.

unnormalised: For DU aspirants, the CUET scores are the name of the game. Remember that exam in May? Well, that's your ticket in. Colleges like SRCC and Hindu College are expected to release their first cutoff lists by 20/07/2024. Good luck!
normalised: For D-U aspirants, the C-U-E-T scores are the name of the game. Remember that exam in May? Well, that's your ticket in. Colleges like S-R-C-C and Hindu College are expected to release their first cutoff lists by twentieth July two thousand and twenty four. Good luck!

unnormalised: Word on the street is that several state universities are also starting their application processes. Keep an eye out for notifications from Mumbai University & Anna University. Some have entrance exams on 15/06/2024.
normalised: Word on the street is that several state universities are also starting their application processes. Keep an eye out for notifications from Mumbai University and Anna University. Some have entrance exams on fifteenth June two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: So, for all those students dreaming of getting into the top colleges: study hard, keep an eye on the deadlines, and may the odds be ever in your favour! Don't forget to check your scorecards and counseling dates. Best of luck, future engineers and doctors!
normalised: So, for all those students dreaming of getting into the top colleges: study hard, keep an eye on the deadlines, and may the odds be ever in your favor! Don't forget to check your scorecards and counseling dates. Best of luck, future engineers and doctors!
